name: Gravityless Karting
description:
Heads up, I made this game in 3 days, just a test for the gravityless gimmick :) Gameplay

Gravityless Karting is an infinite runner, where you try to get the best highscore.

The longer you go, the faster you move!

You can strafe with A & D to avoid the obstacles!

Controls:
  • Move left: A
  • Move right: D
Credits:
  • Spaceship: Quaternius
  • Explosion: Unity
  • SFX: Kenney
  • Song: ESPRIT
  • Everything Else: Me
